scenario1.explanation: Two overpayments were identified: 1) Collision coverage payment of $7,850 did not deduct the $500 deductible, and 2) Rental car payment of $450 was incorrectly paid as $900 (30 days instead of approved 15 days).

scenario2.explanation: Personal property payment of $4,780.00 was issued twice - first on 7/12/2023 (CHK20046) and again on 7/20/2023 (CHK20050) as noted in the transaction log.

scenario3.explanation: Mathematical error in laboratory tests payment calculation. 80% of $780 allowed amount should be $624, but only $464 was paid, resulting in a $160 underpayment to the provider.
